snippet: The married congressman who was seen kissing a female aide on grainy security footage changed course on Monday, announcing that he would run for re-election.
abstract: Rep Vance McAllister, Republican from Louisiana who was videotaped kissing a woman who is not his wife, announces that he will run for re-election despite calls from Republican leadership to resign.
lead_paragraph: The married congressman who was seen kissing a female aide on grainy security footage changed course on Monday, announcing that he would run for re-election.

headline.main: Louisiana: Lawmaker Caught Kissing Aide Changes Mind and Says He Will Run Again
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Lawmaker Caught Kissing Aide Changes Mind and Says He Will Run Again
